preqs: 12 credit points at first year level in Theory of Art & Design, Visual Culture or Cultural Studies

rules.ruleString: Must have passed 2 (I/W) units in {CLS%, TAD%, VSA%}
Incompatible with achievement in (I/W) {TAD2112, TAD3102, TAD3112}

description: Looking across a broad range of mediums, including painting, objects, post-object and conceptual art, performance, experimental cinema, video art, actions, interventions, documents and writings, students will examine work from the Americas, Japan, Europe and Australia from the Post-War period through to the late 20th century. The influence of theory and political ideology on practice will be considered, as  well as the challenge to boundaries, such as high and low art.
faculty: Faculty of Art, Design and Architecture
